title: Organization Information
description: View and manage basic organization information
name: Organization Name
deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to dissolve this organization? This action cannot be undone and all data related to this organization will be permanently deleted.
noPermission: You do not have permission to perform this operation
systemTenantDescription: Default system organization, cannot be dissolved
deleteWarning: This action will permanently delete the organization and all its related data, including but not limited to user data, project data, permission settings, etc. This action cannot be undone.
